text: Albin Chalandon (11 June 1920 in Reyrieux, Ain - 29 July 2020) was a French politician and a former minister. From 1968 and 1972, he was Minister of Public Works. And from 1986 until 1988, he was Minister of Justice. He died on 29 July 2020, aged 100.L’ancien garde des Sceaux Albin Chalandon est mort à l’âge de 100 ans ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Government ministers of France Category:People from Ain Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes
title: Albin Chalandon
